name: Monty's Honey Run
storyline:
Monty bought a honey shop, everything was going great until one day the bees attacked and stole all his honey pots.  
Help Monty collect all the stolen honey pots and return them to his shop. 
Collect various items along the way to unlock new areas.
summary:
Monty's Honey Run is a platformer for the ZX Spectrum featuring the Monty Mole. It is 
 the first unlicensed game developed by Andy Johns, now lead of Bubblesoft Games.
